data.persona: I am the local thief of the village. I pickpocket villagers and loot their homes. I move very fast and I like to operate at night.
data.description:
You are in the Mushroom Hut.
An odd looking hut that sits outside that Witch's cottage. It is squat, mushy, and looks like a mushroom. It is be speckled with spots - black and white. The steam of the mushroom is beige. There is a small door that looks like it would fit a puppy through it.
There's an a small door, a Tool, and a small door here.
The an evil witch and the peasant are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I must keep the horse happy
data.mid_motivation: I am planning a heist on the witch and need a quick getaway
data.long_motivation: I hope to steal an invisibility potion so I can rob the King of his jewels
